jcr:content.awardContent1: Amounts range from $1,000-$7500(non-renewable) per scholarship with 7-15 awards annually.
jcr:content.awardName1: Girl Scouts of Greater Atlanta Gold Award Scholarships
jcr:content.awardReq1: Be a registered Girl Scout with Girl Scouts of Greater Atlanta who has earned the Girl Scout Gold Award Be a high school twelfth grader intending to enter a qualified institution of learning after graduation Complete the appropriate application
